actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to increase the income limitations relating to the payment of pension and dependency and indemnity compensation and to provide supplemental pension payments to certain veterans.

summary.text: Increases the income limitations relating to the payment of veterans' pension and dependency and indemnity compensation. Provides for supplemental pension payments to specified veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to increase the income limitations relating to the payment of pension and dependency and indemnity compensation and to provide supplemental pension payments to certain veterans.
